data.title: TX2touch-90 POWER cobot
data.description: TX2touch is the only cobot with the SIL3/PLe safety level. It is highly productive due to the performance, smart connectivity and reliability inherited from TX2 robots and its CS9 controller.
data.specifications: The TX2touch-90 series has a payload of up to 10 kg with a maximum reach of 1450 mm.
